oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the structure of band edges of 2d periodic elliptic operators
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Filonov, Nikolay
Kachkovskiy, Ilya
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematical Physics
Mathematics - Analysis of PDEs
Mathematics - Spectral Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: For a wide class of 2D periodic elliptic operators, we show that the global extrema of all spectral band functions are isolated.
Comment: 15 pages, 2 figures. Minor corrections made since previous version
